mapper.select: select c.no, c.cover, c.get_date, c.member_no, c.title, to_date(Sysdate) - to_date(c.get_date) as limit, c.get_date as getDate from (select no, cover, member_no, title, get_date from gifticon where member_no = #{memberNo}) c

select * from(select rownum as rnum, d.* from(select c.no, c.cover, c.get_date, c.member_no, c.title, to_date(Sysdate) - to_date(c.get_date) as limit, c.get_date as getDate from (select no, cover, member_no, title, get_date from gifticon where member_no = #{memberNo}) c) d) where (#{pageNo} - 1) * 5 + 1 <= rnum and rnum <= #{pageNo} * 5
